data.actual_result: If you add an option, that new option overwrites an existing one and if you remove an option, that space stays there
data.expected_result: The server context menu adjusts option space properly
data.short_description: The server context menu overrides an existing option when a new option is added
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the server context menu (the menu where you can leave the server) - Grant user a permission that adds an option to the server context menu like manage server - The new option overwrites an old option - If you revert those changes, it goes back to normal - On the other hand, if you remove a permission that adds an option to the server context menu while that person's server context menu is open, the extra space for that option doesn't get removed
